title: So, Sweetheart skins...
body:
Other than the love/Valentine's Day theme, is another major feature of them having hair colors that look vastly different in their splash art?
This bothers me... A lot more than it should, especially when the art is so good.
But, honestly, if I were to buy either of the skins just from the splash art, without seeing a model preview beforehand, I'd be extremely disappointed.

replies.body:
It is still white in the splash.
Its just the light that makes it a bit blond looking.

It's like Vladimirs splash where some people thought he had red hair,simply because of the red light in it.
Correct - this is due to lighting in the splash.

I understand this.
Sona is definitely a step forward from Annie (honestly, who can look at Sweetheart Annie's splash and expect her hair to be white and not blonde?).
But, in the future, could there be a more conscious effort to make the Sweetheart splashes accurately display that they have white hair?
